Eliza Myrie bụ ónyé na-ese ihe nkírí nke bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Chicago, IL. Myrie na-arụ ọrụ na mgbasa ozi dịgasị iche iche gụnyere ihe ọkpụkpụ, nka ntinye aka, nka ọha, na óbíbí akwụkwọ.
Nna Myrie bụ onye na-atụ nkume. Myrie nwetara MFA ya na Mahadum Northwestern na BA ya na Williams College. Myrie bụ ónyé sonyere na The Skowhegan School na The Whitney Independent Study Program.

Myrie guzobere Black Artists Retreat (2013-2016) na Theaster Gates, nke Rebuild Foundation kwadoro, nke kpọkọtara otu ndị na-ese ihe nkírí ojii n'èzí ụlọ ọrụ nka ọdịnala. N'oge oyi 2016, e nyere Myrie MacDowell fellowships. N'afọ 2017/2018, Myrie nwèrè Equal Justice Residency/Fellowship na Santa Fe Art Institute. Myrie bụ ónyé njikwa Wiki Project na Black Lunch Table.
Myrie akụziwo na School of the Art Institute of Chicago na Williams College.
